sen.j: 鹽津神社（しおつじんじゃ）は、滋賀県伊香郡西浅井町に鎮座する神社である。
sen.e: Shiotsu-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine that exists in Nishiazai-cho, Ika County, Shiga Prefecture.
Shiotsu-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine located in Nishiazai-cho, Ika County, Shiga Prefecture.
sen.cmt: that existsをlocatedに変更しました。
sen.e: Shiotsu-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine located in Nishiazai-cho, Ika County, Shiga Prefecture.

sen.cmt: 大文字に変更しました。

sen.e: The first enshrinement date is unknown.
The first enshrinement date is unknown.
The first enshrinement date is unknown.
It is a Engishikinaisha (shrine listed in Engishiki laws) ronja (shrines considered to be descendants of a shikinai-sha).
It is an Engishikinaisha ronja (a Shinto shrine considered to be a descendant of shrines listed in Engishiki laws).
sen.cmt: 括弧の説明を1つにまとめました。
sen.e: It is an Engishikinaisha ronja (a Shinto shrine considered to be a descendant of shrines listed in Engishiki laws).

sen.j: 明治9年に村社、明治17年に郷社に加列された。
sen.e: It was listed as sonsha (village shrine) in 1876 and gosha (village shrine) in 1884.
It was listed as a sonsha (a village shrine) in 1876 and a gosha (a regional shrine) in 1884.
sen.cmt: 郷社をa regional shrineとしました。
sen.e: It was listed as a sonsha (a village shrine) in 1876 and a gosha (a regional shrine) in 1884.

sen.j: 平成20年、近傍の塩津浜遺跡の神社跡から神像五体が出土した。
sen.e: In 2008 five sculptures of deities were unearthed from the site of a shrine in nearby Shiotsuhama ruins.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: In 2008 five sculptures of deities were unearthed from the site of a shrine in nearby Shiotsuhama ruins.
In 2008 five sculptures of deities were unearthed from the site of a shrine in nearby Shiotsuhama ruins.

sen.j: 本神社との関わりについての研究が求められている。
sen.e: The connection between Shiotsu-jinja Shrine and the sculptures has been hoped.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The research into the connection between Shiotsu-jinja Shrine and the sculptures is called for.
sen.cmt: 訳漏れを埋め、現在形に変更しました。
sen.e: The research into the connection between Shiotsu-jinja Shrine and the sculptures is called for.
